title: Apple’s white Magic Keyboard falls to new low at $56 off in today’s best deals, plus more
content:
All of today’s best deals include a new all-time low on Apple’s white Magic Keyboard. That’s alongside the iPad Pro itself at $150 off and the Twelve South StayGo Mini USB-C hub. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Apple’s white Magic Keyboard falls to new low at $56 off in today’s best deals, plus more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple's refreshed White Magic Keyboard for 12.9-inch iPad Pro is now down to a new all-time low following a $56 discount, plus more.
